Verses: 1 appozhudhu Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Nee Bayappadaamalum Kalangaamalum Iru; Nee Yuththa Janangal Yaavaraiyum Koottikkondu Ezhundhu, Aayipattanaththinmel Po, Idho Aayiyin Raajaavaiyum Avan Janaththaiyum Avan Pattanaththaiyum Avan Naattaiyum Un Kaiyile Oppukkoduththen.

2 nee Erigovukkum Adhin Raajaavukkum Seydhabadi, Aayikkum Adhin Raajaavukkum Seyyakkadavaai; Adhil Kollaiyitta Porulkalaiyum Miruga Jeevangalaiyum Ungalukku Kollaiyaaga Eduththukkollalaam, Pattanaththukku Pinnaale Padhividaiyai Vai Endraar.
3 appozhudhu Aayiyinmel Poga, Yosuvaavum Sagala Yuththa Janangalum Ezhundhu Purappattaargal; Yosuvaa Yuththaveeraraana Muppadhinaayiram Perai Therindheduththu Raaththiriyile Avargalai Anuppi,
4 avargalukku Kattalaiyittadhaavadhu: Neengal Pattanaththinpinnaale Padhivirukkavendum; Pattanaththukku Vegudhooramaai Pogaamal, Ellaarum Aayaththamaayirungal.
5 naanum Ennodirukkira Sagala Janangalum Pattanaththandaiyil Kitti Seruvom; Avargal Munpola Engalukku Edhiraaga Purappattu Varumbodhu, Avargalukku Munnaaga Naangal Odippovom.

6 appozhudhu Avargal: Munpola Namakku Munnaaga Murindhu Odippogiraargal Endru Solli, Engalai Thuraththa Purappaduvaargal; Naangalo Avargalai Pattanaththaivittu Ippaale Varappannumattum, Avargalukku Munnaaga Oduvom.
7 appozhudhu Neengal Padhivilirundhu Ezhumbivandhu, Pattanaththai Pidikkavendum; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Adhai Ungal Kaigalil Oppukkoduppaar.
8 neengal Pattanaththai Pidikkumbodhu Adhai Theekkoluththippodungal; Karththarudaiyasolpadi Seyyungal; Idho, Naan Ungalukku Kattalaiyittirukkiren Endru Solli,
9 avargalai Anuppinaan; Avargal Poi, Peththelukkum Aayikkum Naduve, Aayikku Merkaaga Padhivirundhaargal; Yosuvaa Andru Raaththiri Janangalukkul Thanginaan.
10 adhikaalame Yosuvaa Ezhundhirundhu, Janangalai Lakkampaarththu Isravelin Moopparodunkooda Janangalukku Munnaale Nadandhu, Aayiyinmel Ponaan.
11 avanodirundha Yuththa Janangal Ellaarum Nadandhu, Pattanaththukku Edhire Vandhu Serndhu, Aayikku Vadakke Paalayamiranginaargal; Avargalukkum Aayikkum Naduve Oru Pallaththaakku Irundhadhu.
12 avan Erakkuraiya Aiyaayiram Perai Piriththeduththu, Avargalai Peththelukkum Aayikkum Naduve Pattanaththukku Melandaiyil Padhividaiyaaga Vaiththaan.
13 pattanaththukku Vadakke Irundha Sagala Senaiyum Pattanaththirku Merke Padhivirukkiravargalaiyum Thittampanninapinbu, Yosuvaa Andru Raaththiri Pallaththaakkile Poyirundhaan.

14 aayiyin Raajaa Adhaikkandapodhu, Avanum Pattanaththin Manusharaagiya Avanudaiya Sagala Janangalum Theeviriththu, Adhigaalame Kuriththa Velaiyil Isravelarukku Edhire Yuththampanna Samanaana Velikku Neraaga Purappattaargal; Pattanaththukku Pinnaale Thanakku Padhividai Vaiththirukkiradhai Avan Ariyaadhirundhaan.
15 yosuvaavum Isravelar Ellaarum Avargalukku Munnaaga Murindhu, Vanaandharaththukku Pogira Vazhiye Odipponaargal.
16 appozhudhu Pattanaththukkul Irundha Janangal Ellaarum Avargalai Thuraththumbadi Kooppittukkondu Yosuvaavai Pinthodarndhu Pattanaththaivittu Appurappattaargal.
17 aayiyilum Peththelilum Isravelai Pinthodaraadha Manushan Irundhadhillai; Pattanaththai Thirandhuvaiththuvittu, Isravelarai Thuraththikkonduponaargal.

18 appozhudhu Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Un Kaiyil Irukkira Eettiyai Aayikku Neraaga Neettu; Adhai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen Endraar; Appadiye Yosuvaa Than Kaiyil Irundha Eettiyai Pattanaththukku Neraaga Neettinaan.

19 avan Than Kaiyai Neettinavudane, Padhivirundhavargal Theeviramaai Thaangal Irundha Idaththilirundhu Ezhumbi Odi, Pattanaththukku Vandhu, Adhaippidiththu, Theeviraththode Pattanaththai Theekkoluththinaargal.

20 aayiyin Manushar Pinnittu Paarththapodhu, Idho Pattanaththin Pugai Aakaasaththil Ezhumbugiradhai Kandaargal; Appozhudhu Angum Ingum Odippogiradharku Avargalukku Idam Illaamalpoyitru; Vanaandharaththukku Odina Janangal Thangalai Thodarndhavargal Mugamaaiththirumbinaargal.
21 padhivirundhavargal Pattanaththai Pidiththadhaiyum, Pattanaththin Pugai Ezhumbugiradhaiyum, Yosuvaavum Isravelarum Paarththapodhu, Thirumbikkondu, Aayiyin Manusharai Muriya Adiththaargal.

22 pattanaththilirundhavargalum Avargalukku Edhirppattathinaal, Silar Ippuraththilum Silar Appuraththilumirundha Isravelin Naduve Agappattukkondaargal; Aagaiyaal Avargalil Oruvanum Thappi Meendhiraadhabadikku Avargalai Vettippottu,
23 aayiyin Raajaavai Uyirode Pidiththu, Yosuvaavinidaththil Konduvandhaargal.

24 isravelar Vanaandharaveliyile Thangalai Thuraththina Aayiyin Kudigalaiyellaam Vetti Theerndhapodhum, Avargal Anaivarum Naasamaagumattum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vizhundhu Irandhapodhum, Isravelar Ellaarum Aayikkuththirumbi, Adhai Pattayakkarukkinaal Sangariththaargal.
25 annaalile Aanum Pennumaaga Aayiyin Manushar Ellaarum Panneeraayiramper Vizhundhaargal.
26 aayiyin Kudigalaiyellaam Sangariththu Theerumattum, Yosuvaa Eettiyai Neettikkondirundha Than Kaiyai Madakkavillai.
27 karththar Yosuvaavukku Kattalaiyitta Vaarththaiyinbadi, Mirugajeevanaiyum Andha Pattanaththin Kollaiyaiyummaaththiram Isravelar Eduththukkondaargal.
28 yosuvaa Aayiyiyai Sutteriththu, Adhai Innaalvaraikkum Irukkirabadi Endraikkum Paazhaaikkidakkum Manmedaakki,

29 aayiyin Raajaavai Oru Maraththile Thookkippotuviththu, Saayangaalamattum Adhile Thongavittaan; Sooriyan Asthamiththapinbu Yosuvaa Avan Udalai Maraththaivittu Irakka Sonnaan; Adhai Pattanavaasalil Pottu, Innaalvaraikkum Irukkira Periya Karkuviyalai Adhinmel Kuviththaargal.

30 appozhudhu Yosuvaa: Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Isravel Puththirarukku Kattalaiyittabadiyum, Moseyin Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiyum, Epaal Parvadhaththil Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuiruppaayudhampataadha Muzhukkarkalaal Oru Balipeedaththaikkattinaan.
31 adhinmel Karththarukku Sarvaangadhaganabaligalai Seluththi, Samaadhaanabaligalaiyum Ittaargal.
32 isravel Puththirarukku Munbaaga Mose Ezhudhiyirundha Niyaayappiramaanaththai Avan Ange Karkalil Perththezhudhinaan.

33 isravel Janangalai Aaseervadhikkumbadi Karththarin Dhaasanaagiya Mose Mudhalil Kattalaiyittirundhapadiye; Isravelar Ellaarum, Avargaludaiya Moopparum, Adhibadhigalum, Niyaayaadhibadhikalum, Anniyargalum, Isravelil Pirandhavargalumkarththarudaiya Udanbadikkai Pettiyai Sumakkira Leviyaraana Aasaariyarukku Munbaaga, Pettikku Irupuraththilum, Paadhiper Keriseem Malaikku Edhirpuramaagavum, Paadhiper Epaal Malaikku Edhirpuramaagavum Nindraargal.
34 adharkuppinbu Avan Niyaayappiramaana Pusthagaththil Ezhudhiyirukkirabadi Niyaayappiramaanaththilsolliya Aaseervaadhamum Saabamumaagiya Sagala Vaarththaigalaiyum Vaasiththaan.

35 mose Kattalaiyitta Ellaavatrilum Yosuvaa, Isravelin Muzhusabaikkum, Sthireegalukkum Pillaigalukkum, Avargalukkul Nadamaadi Sanjariththa Anniyargalukkum Munbaaga, Oru Vaarththaiyaiyum Vidaamal Vaasiththaan.
